price: Kuma bãbu kõwa daga gare ku sai mai tuzga mata.* Yã kasance wajibi ga Ubangijinka, hukuntacce.
arabic: وَإِن مِّنكُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَاۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡمٗا مَّقۡضِيّٗا
footnotes: * Idan an tãra mutãne dõmin hisabi, anã ajiye wuta a tsakãnin mutãne da Aljanna, Sa'annan a gitta sirãɗi a cikan wutar dõmin mutãne su bi akansa su ƙetare wutar zuwa Aljanna kuma waɗansu su fãɗa a cikin wutar dõmin azãba dawwamamma kõ kuma ta ɗan lõkaci gwargwadon laifi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in minkum illā wāriduhā kāna ʿalā rabbika ḥatman maqḍiyyan
